text: The 1995 Cincinnati Bearcats football team represented the University of Cincinnati during the 1995 NCAA Division I-A football season. The Bearcats, led by second-year head coach Rick Minter, participated as independents and played their home games at Nippert Stadium. ==Schedule== == References == Cincinnati Bearcats Category:Cincinnati Bearcats football seasons Cincinnati Bearcats
title: 1995 Cincinnati Bearcats football team
